title: BC模组服进不去

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
服务器版本和客户端版本一致么？

什么核心 模组服跨服请用waterfall https://papermc.io/downloads#Waterfall

replies.author: 落花雨喵
replies.txt_content:
MOD服建议把BC更换为HexaCord
https://archive.mcmirror.io/HexaCord/HexaCord-v222.jar
然后把config.yml里的forge_support选项改为true

https://github.com/HexagonMC/BungeeCord/releases

客户端的版本是?进入的服务器版本呢
